ctu.nengoros.util.sync

Interface SyncedUnitInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Decoder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsNeuralModule, BasicDecoder, DefaultNeuralModule, MultipleInputNeuralModule, SyncedUnit

    public interface SyncedUnitInterface
    Represents basically an object that can be in two states: ready/notReady If you want to use hierarchical infrastructure, extend abstract SyncedUnit

    • Method Summary
